blogs.title: Opiate
blogs.body: If you want to get your soul to heaven, trust in me. Don't judge or question. You are broken now, but faith can heal you. Just do everything I tell you to do. Deaf and blind and dumb and born to follow. Let me lay my holy hand upon you.
blogs.author: Maynard Keenan

blogs.title: Undertow
blogs.body: But I'm so comfortable. Far too comfortable. Why don't you kill me, I'm weak and numb and insignificant, and I'm back on my knees. lost in euphoria.
blogs.author: Adam Jones
